high_descs: Turn left to face the wall, walk until reach the end of the couch, turn right, walk to the ottoman, turn right.  Walk along the couch until the last section where two laptops and a credit card are placed.

Turn around, walk to the wall, turn left towards the chair and ottoman.
Place the laptop on the right side of the ottoman, with the opening facing the wall.

Place the laptop on the left side of the ottoman, next to the other one, with the opening end facing you.

Put the pencil on the grey plate that is on the large wooden table next to the two white vases.
